channel.title: Hey, which server
channel.description:
Been here for awhile just never created an account.
I am generally good at java coding.
But my question is..
What servers do people mostly use? I hear a lot about Delta scape, but then I also hear about it being completely crappy.
All these #1 servers, they all run 317s.. I take it their base is Delta? Hyperion? Just trying to find myself the best base to mess around on and learn a bit more about the development of these PSs. (Not really into rs2 fyi, just here to learn)

item.title: Hey, which server
item.dc:creator: @WolfPK WolfPK
item.description:
@WolfPK wrote:

I Vain I:

Just use Bluur’s or Galkon’s client, or you can Google search ‘DeltaScape Client v16’

Yeah, I got a very basic base of Bluur’s client thats quite empty.
Thanks.

Read full topic

deathschaos9:

Hopefully this isn’t another one of those rubbish servers with a shit load of customs and bad coding that causes crashes. - sigh, been through too many of those -

item.title: Hey, which server
item.dc:creator: @WolfPK WolfPK
item.description:
@WolfPK wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]DeltaScape is what most people tend to use.

Yes, it’s crappy, but that’s because at the time it was made, Delta knew nothing about conventions, and added too much junk code for no reason.

It’s possible to have a stable DeltaScape server, though a lot of modifications would be needed.

My best bet, if you’re a beginner, use DeltaScape or Czar.

Both are extremely easy to code, and very basic.

Hyperion would be the best to code, if you know conventions, the methods, and you can write content from scratch.
Hyperion has the potential to be good, stablility wise.
Though, it lacks detail and content in a lot of ways.[/quote]

Alright. Thanks a lot, would you happen to know where I could find a good Delta source that I could actually use? And mess around with?

Thanks.

Read full topic
